item.description:
Manchester History Network Meeting
"Sharing Manchester's Stories Through Oral History"

Saturday, February 27, 2010
At the Millyard Museum
10:30 a.m.-12:00 p.m.
FREE Admission for Manchester Historic Association members; others pay regular museum admission

Members of the Manchester History Network, and Manchester Historic Association members, are invited to attend this special meeting and get-together. Get to know fellow history buffs and learn about the MHAâ€™s ongoing oral history projects. Aurore Eaton, Executive Director will give an overview of the Manchester Historic Association's current work to document history through personal stories and recollections, including an illustrated presentation on one of these projects: "The USO in Manchester During World War II" that focuses on city life on the homefront. Share cookies, conversation and your love of history!
item.name: Manchester History Network Meeting at the Millyard Museum
